gruppe.irc

Class MessageHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • gruppe.irc.MessageHandler

  • public class MessageHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Class made for handling all message-events that occurs in our client
    Author:
    Anders, Christian and Olaf.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void handleJoinAndPart(java.lang.String prefix, java.lang.String message, java.lang.String nick, java.lang.String cmd)
      A join or part command appears when we join a new channel, or when a new user joins/parts a channel we are a member of.
      void handlePrivForChan(java.lang.String prefix, java.lang.String message)
      Message to a specific chan, channelname and the message is parsed out, and sent to the method that distributes messages to channels.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • handlePrivForChan

        public void handlePrivForChan(java.lang.String prefix,
                     java.lang.String message)
        Message to a specific chan, channelname and the message is parsed out, and sent to the method that distributes messages to channels. A user can not receive messages from a channel that he not is a member of, so the tab will always exist.
        Parameters:
        prefix - Prefixmessage, passed to distributeChannel.
        message - the target-channel and the actual message is in this string.

      • handleJoinAndPart

        public void handleJoinAndPart(java.lang.String prefix,
                     java.lang.String message,
                     java.lang.String nick,
                     java.lang.String cmd)
        A join or part command appears when we join a new channel, or when a new user joins/parts a channel we are a member of.
        Parameters:
        prefix - The standard prefix-message.
        message - message includes chan where the join/parted action happended.
        nick - The nick of the user who joined/parted.
        cmd - Will always be PART or JOIN.
